tool_description: Simple api to get random movies or multiple
name: Movie API
title: Movie API

api_list.name: Movie By ID
api_list.description: Get a movie by its id

api_list.name: Multiple Movies
api_list.description: Get up to 20 items per request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-api28.p.rapidapi.com/multiple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-api28.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Random Movie
api_list.description: This will return a random movie, with details about the movie.
